messages.msgSnippet: My dd would too.  Maybe you could work with her on that.  She wanted to create one called eatmorechicken  (we love chick-fil-A) but needs to get people to sign
messages.messageBody:
My dd would too. Maybe you could work with her on that. She wanted to create one called
eatmorechicken (we love chick-fil-A) but needs to get people to sign on. I know nothing
about guild creation...she is a lvl 13 in Antonidas. So higher help would be great! We are
still pretty new.

messages.subject: Re: New WoW guild forming at RUN
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My son has a great level 70 warrior orc, loves to offtank, but his guild dissolved and he is not getting to off tank much in his new guild. Is there a
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
My son has a great level 70 warrior orc, loves to offtank, but his
guild dissolved and he is not getting to off tank much in his new
guild. Is there a group of unschoolers, or even one of you not in an
unschooler guild who could use him for Karazhan, he would love to get
back in action, he is in Venture Co.

Thasnks,

Cara

>

> guild. But I can always make a new toon anywhere. :) Just let me
> know. :)
>
>
> Shana

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] New WoW guild forming at RUN
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter would like to join, but needs to know the server.  Can you keep us posted?  We are not members of RUN. Judy Arnall,  Peaceful Parenting, Family and
messages.messageBody:
My daughter would like to join, but needs to know the server. Can you keep us posted? We are not members of RUN.

Judy Arnall, Peaceful Parenting, Family and Relationship Expert, Speaker (Professional Member of CAPS) and Author of "Discipline Without Distress: 135 tools for raising caring, responsible children without time-out, spanking, punishment or bribery" www.professionalparenting.ca Tele: (403) 714-6766 Email jarnall@... "Peace In The World Begins In The Home"

messages.messageBody:
Hello!
Cool another WoW person! I have toons all over the place. I run my
own Guild. It's called Thor's Hammer on Arathor Server. It's a small
guild. But I can always make a new toon anywhere. :) Just let me
know. :)


Shana
